scripts.deploy: npm run build && aws s3 sync dist s3://ckoch-0511-dev-bucket --delete --exclude index.html --cache-control "public,max-age=31536000,immutable" && aws s3 cp dist/index.html s3://ckoch-0511-dev-bucket/index.html --cache-control "no-cache" --content-type "text/html" && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E1W5ONHWPC7QO2 --paths "/*"
